channel.title: IT STEM on Cache Valley Communities
channel.description: Recent content in IT STEM on Cache Valley Communities

item.title: IT STEM Summer Camp (9th Grade Students) - June 2025
item.description: Calling all incoming 9th grade students interested in information technology! The IT STEM summer camp will be June 10th - June 20th, 2025 (Tuesday - Friday), 8:00 AM – 12:00 PM (MST) at Bridgerland Technical College Build, code, and explore with hands-on Raspberry Pi projects, computer teardown, cyber security, and programming. Get ready to jumpstart your future in tech!
